name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: This reminds me of that elusive one-quest-per-d ay in WoW where a wizard would ask you to switch on the lights of Dalaran at around 6pm game time.

source_obj.text: This reminds me of that elusive one-quest-per-d ay in WoW where a wizard would ask you to switch on the lights of Dalaran at around 6pm game time.
